example_modid.msg: Custom msg on crash for this mod id. You can use $JAR_NAME$ placeholder, which will be replaced with jar name. You can use HTML here, it will work.

pigium1_12_2.msg:
Pigium is a placebo and not an actual performance mod. It was originally made for a YouTube video.
Fix: Delete $JAR_NAME$ from the mods folder.

attributefix.msg:
Attribute Fix has been merged and rewritten in Universal Tweaks.
Fix: Delete $JAR_NAME$ from the mods folder.

bedpatch.msg:
Bed Patch's fix already exists within Forge / Cleanroom and doesn't do anything when installed.
Fix: Delete $JAR_NAME$ from the mods folder.

betterfps.msg:
BetterFPS is known to cause crashes with little to no performance gain. Many of the improvements are already included in other mods.
Fix: Delete $JAR_NAME$ from the mods folder.

clumps.msg:
Clumps is superseded by Fixeroo, which uses a better and more compatible implementation.
Fix: Delete $JAR_NAME$ from the mods folder.

dupefixproject.msg:
DupeFix Project is not compatible with MixinBooter. Universal Tweaks and the forks of the affected mods already include the same fixes.
Fix: Delete $JAR_NAME$ from the mods folder.

fastbench.msg:
Fast Workbench has been merged and rewritten in CensoredASM.
Fix: Delete $JAR_NAME$ from the mods folder.

fastfurnace.msg:
Fast Furnace has been merged and rewritten in Universal Tweaks.
Fix: Delete $JAR_NAME$ from the mods folder.

fpsboostremake.msg:
FPS Boost has little to no performance gain.
Fix: Delete $JAR_NAME$ from the mods folder.

gpu_tape.msg:
GPUTape has little to no performance gain.
Fix: Delete $JAR_NAME$ from the mods folder.

mup.msg:
Eigencraft Unofficial Patch / MUP is known to cause crashes and is outdated. Universal Tweaks already has most of its fixes and Alfheim already has lighting optimizations.
Fix: Delete $JAR_NAME$ from the mods folder.

netherportalfix.msg:
A completely different and better implementation of the fix by NetherPortalFix already exists in Universal Tweaks.
Fix: Delete $JAR_NAME$ from the mods folder.

performant.msg:
Performant is an empty mod jar. All code in the mod has been commented out.
Fix: Delete $JAR_NAME$ from the mods folder.

redirectionor.msg:
Redirectionor has little to no performance gain.
Fix: Delete $JAR_NAME$ from the mods folder.

surge.msg:
Surge uses deprecated methods and has no real performance gain. Salvaged features have been merged into Universal Tweaks.
Fix: Delete $JAR_NAME$ from the mods folder.

vintagium.msg:
Vintagium and its forks are known to cause crashes and are outdated. Celeritas serves as the continuation with better compatibility.
Fix: Delete $JAR_NAME$ from the mods folder.
